author: Thomas Bristow
title: Chelsea striker Diego Costa compares himself to unlikely Real Madrid and Spain defender
text:
Chelsea striker Diego Costa compares himself to unlikely Real Madrid and Spain defender The 28-year-old is currently on international duty and preparing for a 2018 World Cup qualifier on Friday   Diego Costa compares himself to Sergio Ramos   football   Could   
Diego Costa has compared himself to an unlikely footballer - Sergio Ramos . 
The Chelsea striker is on international duty with Spain this week and will have linked up with the Real Madrid defender over the past few days. 
The pair will have also faced each other several times in La Liga when Costa played for Atletico Madrid. 
Spain take on Israel on Friday night in a 2018 World Cup qualifier before facing France in a friendly on Wednesday. 
And with some free time between training Costa took the opportunity to praise his countryman. Sergio Ramos and Diego Costa together in Spain training (Photo: David Ramos) Costa has faced Ramos before (Photo: Victor Carretero) 
He said: "He's just like me. He wants to win, he'll hit you. 
"He was the first to meet me [with the national team]. Better as a teammate [than an opponent], as an opponent I like him too, different types of games, it motivates me." poll loading Will Diego Costa leave Chelsea in the summer? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
